Reviews.Title: “Moderately priced and close to Zocalo”
Reviews.Author: gdenton
Reviews.Content: paid 610 52 figured actual exchange rate including various transaction fees charged banks etc march 25 2011 overlooking street below 3 sets windows bathroom bed weird windows onto stairwell looked inhabited european backpackers looked assured nicer shown basically decent location mexico city price pay lousy motel 6 east usa look believe complain safe skanky stay skanky staff averagenot particularly friendly rude kids spend alot time texting friends benefit restaurant below makes pretty darn little pick reasonable prices 10 huge sandwiches giant fresh fruit drinks course taco stands cheaper hey walked stairs grabbed food time half price hampton inn corner 23 nice value

Reviews.Title: “Great Location. You get what you paid for”
Reviews.Author: alex_tripper
Reviews.Content: location 2 3 blocks zocalo ive times mexico city woulnt mind return hotel located main streets historical center minutes call reservation didnt answer bed hard pillows thin walk city day wont youll tired notice changed staff kindly care changing stuff free breakfast included recommend else hotels restaurant top floor guests hotel ritz nice sleep rest recommend hotel people tight budget looking rest nights

Reviews.Title: “Moderately Priced Hotel in The Center”
Reviews.Author: David I
Reviews.Content: visited hotel canada spent 445 pesos night saturday bad price hotels half price pretty comfortable walls paper thin hear ladies talk hours else relationship double price walls thin hotel standards note stayed voucher free breakfast little impatient dining wasnt wait time

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Canada
